%% Autogenerated 06 Jul, 2020 17:40:19

\begin{lstlisting}
(* A|B|C *)
match ... with
| A -> 1 
| B -> 1 
| C -> 0 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* BIG 2 clauses  *)
match ... with
| triple (_, _, cons (Ldi (_), _)) -> 1 
| triple (_, _, cons (Push, _)) -> 2 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* BIG : 2.5 clauses  *)
match ... with
| triple (_, _, cons (Ldi (_), _)) -> 1 
| triple (_, _, cons (Push, _)) -> 2 
| triple (Int (_), _, cons (IOp (_), _)) -> 3 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* bool *)
match ... with
| true -> 1 
| false -> 0 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* bool*bool *)
match ... with
| pair (true, _) -> 1 
| pair (_, true) -> 1 
| pair (false, false) -> 0 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* bool*bool*bool (Maranget;page1) *)
match ... with
| triple (_, false, true) -> 1 
| triple (false, true, _) -> 2 
| triple (_, _, false) -> 3 
| triple (_, _, true) -> 4 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* simple nats (a la Maranget2008) *)
match ... with
| pair (succ (_), succ (_)) -> 30 
| pair (zero, _) -> 10 
| pair (_, zero) -> 10 
\end{lstlisting}

\begin{lstlisting}
(* two-nil lists (with cons; simplified RHS) *)
match ... with
| pair (nil, _) -> 10 
| pair (_, nil) -> 10 
| pair (nil2, _) -> 10 
| pair (_, nil2) -> 10 
| pair (cons (_, _), cons (_, _)) -> 60 
\end{lstlisting}
